english.segment1: You don't have to be ashamed. 'Cause you're a miracle through and through. Oh, and you don't have to be ashamed. Of the miracle inside of you
english.segment2: What has love become?. (What has love become?). It's not like we're used to hearing those old songs. And it's not like yours. (And it's not like yours). What has love become?
english.segment3: Whoa..your love is in motion. And it's spinning me around, yeah. Whoa..my heart is in motion. For the movement that's in you
english.segment4: You should not be angry. If all she wants is your money. Oh, you should not be angry. 'Cause all you want is her body
english.segment5: What has love become?. (What has love become?). It's not like we're used to hearing those old songs. And it's not like yours. (And it's not like yours). What has love become?
english.segment6: Whoa..your love is a fast song. And I'm dancing 'cause I'm in love with you. Whoa..my heart is in motion. For the rhythm inside you. Whoa..your love is a slow song. It's resounding through my world again. Whoa..my heart is in motion. For the song inside of you
english.segment7: Whoa..your love is in motion. And it's spinning me around, yeah. Whoa..your love is a fast song. And I'm dancing 'cause I'm in love with you. Whoa..your love is a slow song. It's resounding through my world again. Whoa..my heart is in motion. For the song inside of you
